Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is a free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like Zapakmail, Netaddress, Lycos, Plaxo, Apropo, Canoe, Inbox.com, AOL, Inet, Libero, Wp.pt, Virgilio, Uk2, Aussiemail, Azet, Xing, 5Fm, Nz11, GMX.net, India, Meta, FastMail, Popstarmail, Mail.com, IndiaTimes, Live/Hotmail, LinkedIn, Bordermail, Sapo.pt, MSN, OperaMail, Gawab, Web.de, Interia, Care2, Clevergo, Freemail, Doramail, O2, Yahoo!, Mail2World, Mynet.com, Atlas, Walla, Techemail, Yandex, Kids, Rambler, Mail.ru, YouTube, KataMail, Grafitti, Terra, Mail.in, Bigstring, Evite, Abv, GMail, Pochta, Rediff, Hushmail or social portals like Badoo, Hyves, Flixster, Brazencareerist, Last.fm, Facebook, Plurk, Konnects, Friendfeed, Twitter, Skyrock, Xuqa, Mydogspace, Bookcrossing, Mycatspace, Faces, Meinvz, Friendster, Tagged, Mevio, Lovento, Cyworld, Eons, Ning, Motortopia, Koolro, Livejournal, Xanga, Vimeo, Perfspot, Plazes, NetLog, Flickr, Famiva, Orkut, Hi5, Multiply, Kincafe, Fdcareer, MySpace, Flingr, Bebo, Vkontakte. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like joovili, Boonex Dolphin, nowFire, PHPMELODY, Social Engine 4, Wordpress, Social Engine, Vwebmail, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), myBB, phpizabi, jamit job, Joomla1.0, Etano, PhpBB, vBulletin, phpFoX, Drupal, E107, Dating Pro, RoundCube, Joomla, symfony, JamRoom, Atmail5, Buddy Zone, PunBB. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
